Disneyland.name: Disneyland
Disneyland.description: The iconic original Disney theme park: filled with themed lands (Fantasyland, Adventureland, Tomorrowland, etc.), classic attractions, parades, fireworks, and immersive storytelling. It’s often called “The Happiest Place on Earth.”

Anaheim Packing House.name: Anaheim Packing House
Anaheim Packing House.description: Once a citrus packing facility, now a restored gourmet food hall and gathering spot. You'll find dozens of food vendors, communal seating, live music, and a lively local vibe.

Oak Canyon Nature Center.name: Oak Canyon Nature Center
Oak Canyon Nature Center.address: 6700 E. Walnut Canyon Rd, Anaheim, CA 92807
Oak Canyon Nature Center.description: A 58‑acre nature preserve tucked into Anaheim Hills, with about 4 miles of hiking trails, oak woodland, riparian habitat, and a small interpretive center with live animal exhibits.

Menzu Museum & Cultural Center.name: Menzu Museum & Cultural Center
Menzu Museum & Cultural Center.description: A local museum in downtown Anaheim that offers rotating exhibits in art, local history, and cultural themes. It’s a quieter stop for those looking to explore Anaheim’s cultural side.

K1 Speed (Go-Karting).name: K1 Speed (Go-Karting)
K1 Speed (Go-Karting).address: 3175 E. La Palma Ave, Anaheim, CA 92806
K1 Speed (Go-Karting).description: Indoor electric go-kart racing for speed and thrills in a controlled environment. A fun option if you want some action outside of Disney.

Founders' Park + Woelke-Stoffel House.name: Founders' Park + Woelke-Stoffel House
Founders' Park + Woelke-Stoffel House.description: A heritage park featuring the Woelke‑Stoffel House (a restored Victorian / Queen Anne home), the Mother Colony House, and carriage house. Tours are offered occasionally (often the first Saturday of each month).

Storybook Land Canal Boats.name: Storybook Land Canal Boats
Storybook Land Canal Boats.description: Hop aboard a charming open-air boat piloted by a Disneyland Cast Member and float through a beautifully detailed miniature world. The Storybook Land Canal Boats take you past tiny scenes from beloved Disney animated films, all nestled into a lush, landscaped setting.

Angel Stadium.name: Angel Stadium / Honda Center
Angel Stadium.address: 2000 E. Gene Autry Way, Anaheim, CA 92806
Angel Stadium.description: Home of the Los Angeles Angels MLB team. Catch a baseball game, take a ballpark tour, or enjoy the electric atmosphere during game nights.
